news.body: IAL 1.34b supports the latest version of DL 1.54.0, Please report bugs on the Discord ial-dl-bug-reporting channel, thanks and happy gaming
The new 3.0 Launcher is out! Make sure to grab the latest launcher
Use the mod config page to modify and create your own mods! Save your changes to a custom config and apply after any official update.
I Am Legion 1.34 brings more diversity to the world with a range of new enemies and friendlies you can encounter. Please report bugs to the Discord IAL-dl1-bug-reporting section.
I Am Legion has been updated to support the latest release of the game.
I Am Legion will be coming to The Beast when it is released so stay tuned.
Development on IALR will continue after the tools have been finished. The tools are currently at 95% completion and alpha releases will hoping go out in November
